Ninja Cash is a decentralized peer to peer (P2P) cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to trade ETH and BTC for cash. You can join us anonymously: no signup, no ID verification, no fraud
Read more about us here

Ninja Cash is a peer to peer decentralized cryptocurrency exchange - where you remain anonymous. We got rid of extensive KYC practices, and then we put it on the blockchain. We welcome into our dojo anyone interested in disruption, games of stealth, and decentralized tech.

Ninjas create blockchain powered solutions that are both practical and playful, and apply them to industries plagued by rampant fraud, greedy middlemen and pointless bureaucracy.

Our team of ninjas is based in California, United States.

Ninja is open-source, decentralized software that never holds your funds. By freely choosing to use Ninja, the user accepts sole responsibility for their behavior and agrees to abide by the legalities of their governing jurisdiction. Ninja cannot be liable for legal, monetary or psychological damages should you do something stupid. Never invest more than you are willing to lose. Play safe!

Ninja is an anonymous peer-to-peer decentralized prediction exchange running on top of the Ethereum blockchain.
Whatâs special about PEX? Why should i bet on one?

It allows parties to directly bet against each other without going through a central authority or bookmaker. This makes it 100% anonymous, no signs up no downloads required. The management of bets and the settlement of winnings are carried out collectively by the blockchain network, protecting users from any single point of failure. You can also create your own prediction markets.
Do I need Ether? Does it support other cryptocurrencies?
Yes. Ninja only accepts ETH for now, but support will be added for other currencies very soon.
How do I start with Ninja?
You can either buy ETH directly in PEX with your credit cards or from popular coin exchanges like Coinbase or Binance.
You can either buy ETH directly in PEX with your credit cards or from popular coin exchanges like Coinbase or Binance.

Pick the market you want to bet (i.e. Brazil - Spain), the outcomes (i.e. Brazil wins) and the site (i.e. support or bet against the outcome)
Enter the stake you want to bet (i.e. 1 ETH) and the odds (i.e. 1/ 2.25)
The PEX Matching Engine will then find another order that bets against the odds you set.
if you win, your winnings will be automatically transferred from the escrow smart contract to your account.
Whatâs special about PEX? Why should i bet on one?

Yes! When creating your own bet, youâll enter the event youâre interested in and the outcome you want to bet on. Then, simply enter your stake and the odds you want. Then the PEX Engine will automatically find and match you with anyone that has an interest in the same event, and who accepts your odds.
How do you police unsavory/illegal bets?
We are currently building a system of checks and balances to flag up inappropriate behaviour in the dojo.
How does the system know the result of bets between people? Who acts as arbitrator and verifies one outcome vs. another at conclusion of contract?

Ninja will soon have a completely decentralized solution for verifying the outcome and incentivizing truth telling (a DAO of reporters!). In the meantime, as we will launch just in time for the FIFA world cup, our team will use a public source (livescore.com) and act as the reporter.
No one holds the funds. All the funds are kept safe in escrow until a resolution is reached.
Why should I bet on blockchain instead of using traditional methods?
A decentralized prediction exchange will provide you the freedom to create your own odds and bet directly with anyone, offer you 100% ninja anonymity and guaranteed payouts.
Ninja requires no downloads, and no sign ups. That means no passwords, no phone numbers and no emails. 100% anonymity.
Do I need to pay any fees?
There are two main types of fees: creator fees (for the ninja that creates the bet) and the network fee (a percentage of the creator fee, that goes towards maintaining the platform).
What do I need to do when the outcome is finalized?
Nothing. If you win, your winnings will be automatically transferred to your account. If you lose, it will be someone elseâs account.
Where can I find a match to bet on?
On the homepage, youâll be able to browse ongoing bets and markets. If you canât find any you like, create your own!
Other than sports, can I bet on anything else? How does it work?

Very soon, Ninja will apply to everything under the sun. The only limitation will be your creativity. You can easily create any market on any future event, be it sports, politics, science, markets, climateâ¦ you name it.
Whatâs gonna happen to the Handshake mobile app?
We will be integrating Handshake (and your favourite features like promises, IOUs, contract upload, etc.) into the Ninja mobile website.

Whatâs the difference between Ninja ATM and other crypto ATMs?
Ninja ATM is a tool to help people who want to buy crypto purchase it easily and anonymously. You donât need a debit or credit card, and you donât need to pay any transaction fees.
Do I need an account to use a Ninja ATM?
Nope, thereâs no prior registration needed! We donât have a compulsory KYC process.
All over the world! Check out ninja.org/atm on your mobile or tablet to find your nearest ATM.
Will I be truly anonymous on Ninja ATM?
Yes, your entire transaction history is anonymous. We donât ask for any personal information when you buy crypto with Ninja ATMs.
100%. All of the transactions made through Ninja ATM are secured by smart contracts written on the Ethereum blockchain.
Which currencies can I use with Ninja ATMs?
Ninja Cash is global, so you buy crypto in the local currency, or in USD if you and the ATM owner prefer.
How long does it takes to complete a transaction?
Transactions usually take a few minutes to go through. It may take slightly longer if the blockchain is experiencing unusually high traffic.
How do I keep my Ninja wallet safe?
Make sure to secure and backup your wallet. We suggest that instead of keeping the passwords in your phone, you make a hard copy and keep this hidden in a safe place.
Who do I contact if I have a problem or a question?
You can chat to us on Telegram t.me/ninja_org or email support@ninja.org

Ninja is an anonymous peer-to-peer decentralized prediction exchange running on top of the Ethereum blockchain.
Whatâs special about PEX? Why should i bet on one?

It allows parties to directly bet against each other without going through a central authority or bookmaker. This makes it 100% anonymous, no signs up no downloads required. The management of bets and the settlement of winnings are carried out collectively by the blockchain network, protecting users from any single point of failure. You can also create your own prediction markets.
Do I need Ether? Does it support other cryptocurrencies?
Yes. Ninja only accepts ETH for now, but support will be added for other currencies very soon.
How do I start with Ninja?

â Get Ether:
You can either buy ETH directly in PEX with your credit cards or from popular coin exchanges like Coinbase or Binance.

â Top up your PEX Wallet:
Transfer the ETH into the PEX Wallet. PEX Wallet is completely decentralized, the private key is held on your phone, only you can transfer and receive ETH.

â Place a bet:
Pick the market you want to bet (i.e. Brazil - Spain), the outcomes (i.e. Brazil wins) and the site (i.e. support or bet against the outcome)
Enter the stake you want to bet (i.e. 1 ETH) and the odds (i.e. 1/ 2.25)
The BEX Matching Engine will then find another order that bets against the odds you set.

â Wait for the report: if you win, your winnings will be automatically transferred from the escrow smart contract to your account.
Can I set my own preferred odds? How?

Yes! When creating your own bet, youâll enter the event youâre interested in and the outcome you want to bet on. Then, simply enter your stake and the odds you want. Then the PEX Engine will automatically find and match you with anyone that has an interest in the same event, and who accepts your odds.

We are currently building a system of checks and balances to flag up inappropriate behaviour in the dojo.

How do I start earning ETH/Bitcoin?/How do I put cryptocurrency in my wallet?
Ninja Wallet is a decentralized cryptocurrency wallet, that allows you to hold multiple cryptocurrencies. There are no downloads,  no sign ups and no fees.
How many cryptocurrencies can I use with Ninja Wallet?
You can use BTC, BCH, ETH, ZEC, LTC, XRP, ERC20 Tokens and ERC721 Collectables.
How much does it cost to use?
Ninja Wallet is open source and free for all users.
How do I create an account?
You simply go to our website www.ninja.org/wallet. It will auto creates your wallet BTC, ETH etc on your device. Or you can import/restore you have.
What countries can I use Ninja Wallet in?
Ninja Wallet is available globally - all you need is access to a mobile device and the internet.
What happens if I swap/lose my phone? Will I lose my wallet?
We recommend all users backup their wallets as soon as they start using Ninja. We have explained how to backup your Ninja Wallet here.

The DAD or the Decentralized Autonomous Dataset is a crowdsourcing initiative, with the aim to collect data and reward users through blockchain incentives. We believe that this will be a positive step towards advancing AI, breaking barriers when it comes to Big Data.

Anyone can contribute their images to the DAD.
All you need to do is join the platform, upload your photos, and any tags that will help to identify what they are, location etc.

If you see a photo and you know where it was taken, or can add more information then just tag the image.
Can anyone buy datasets from DAD?
Yes, our datasets are available to everyone.
How are the profits distributed to the people who contribute?
10% of all profits will be kept for further development of the DAD platform. The remaining 90% of the profits will be evenly distributed to all the users that contributed to the dataset.
Can I track who has purchased my data?
The DAD is built on top of Ethereumâs blockchain, this means that all transactions are public. You will be able to track your own data, and see who has purchased the datasets.
How can I contribute data to the DAD?

All you need to do is go to our app and start contributing which every data you like, the more information (location, colour, etc) the better. We want to create decentralized datasets that are constantly growing and evolving.
How will the DAD benefit AI technology?

AI needs data. Currently, there are only a few corporations that have access to the kind of big data that is needed for AI technology to learn and grow. We aim to solve this global issue by creating decentralized autonomous datasets that anyone will have access too.
How do I receive my payout from contributing data?
You will automatically receive payout via your ETH address.
You donât have the dataset I need, can you create one?
Yes, all you need to do is put in a request for a specific dataset and we will begin to curate that dataset.
Once you have my data, do you have it forever?

Yes all of the data that you contribute will be stored on the blockchain, this means it cannot be deleted. It also means that you will continue to receive payouts on DAD as long as your data is being sold.

Ninja Coin is a product of Shanzhai Limited - a Hong Kong-based company with offices in Ho Chi Minh City, New York and California. We provide a platform where people can buy crypto more conveniently, safely and with the most attractive price
How do I buy coin on Ninja?

Step 1: Visit https://ninja.org/coin
Step 2: Verify your identity
Step 3: Select/Scan your crypto wallet
Step 4: Enter the amount of coin you want to buy (or the amount of fiat money you want to use to buy coin)
Step 5: Choose your buying method: Bank Transfer/COD
Step 6: Click Buy
Step 7: Make payment according to your buying method:
  • If you choose Bank Transfer: make a bank transfer
  • If you choose COD: Enter your address, time and phone number. Wait for Ninja to come and pay with bank account/credit card/cash
How to create account on Ninja?

Ninja Coin will create an account for you immediately the first time you visit us at https://ninja.org/coin instead of traditional login with email/username and password. However, you can only purchase after youâve done the verification process

Transaction Value Verification Information Required
<$500 Photo of your ID (both sides)
<$5000 Photo of your ID (both sides)
Selfie with your ID and a paper written âNinja Coinâ
Why do I need to verify my identity?

Your account must be verified to comply with relevant anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) laws and regulations. We do not and will never sell or rent your personal information to any third parties
Is buying coin on Ninja secure?
Every transaction on Ninja is covered 100% by a warranty with value up to $1000 each
What is the maximum amount can I purchase?

The maximum amount depends on user verification level and is up to $5000/day/user by now. We are working on expanding it in the near future

Verification Level Maximum amount
Photo of your ID (both sides) $500/user/day
Photo of your ID (both sides)
Selfie with your ID and a paper written âNinja Coinâ 		$5000/user/day
What payment method can I use?

Buying method Payment method
Bank Transfer (Buying online) Bank transfer
COD (Buying offline) Bank transfer
Credit card
Cash

  • For buying online, you conduct the payment separately from the platform. We will transfer the coin to your wallet once we have received your payment
  • For buying offline, we will arrange a meetup with the time and address you provide. You can pay with your bank account, credit card or cash after you have received your coin from Ninja
How long should I wait to receive my coin?
It depends on the time for the bank to process transactions (for buying online) and for the blockchain network to do the confirmations, which usually only takes a few minutes
What happens if the price changes during my transaction?
Your price is fixed at the time you place a buy order. Therefore, all the later changes in price will not affect your transaction
We only takes 2% fee when you pay with credit card. Other payment options remain free
How can I contact for support?
Feel free to contact us via live chat if you need any support for buying coin on Ninja
Select the coin you want to buy/sell along with your desired price
Search and choose the most suitable shop in your location
Meet up at the shop and exchange cash to coin or coin to cash
Process has been secured 100% by smart contract

Anonymous Peer-to-Peer Prediction Exchange on Ethereum
Hello! We are Roc, Bakunawa, Hakawai and Grootslang from the Ninja team. We are building an electronic prediction exchange on the blockchain. Hereâs why we did it, and how it works!
Online betting is run almost exclusively by bookmakers that serve as trusted third parties. As is typically the case, the users suffer from this âcentralized trusted thirty party problemâ:
Bookmakers set the odds that always favor them (they always win)
Bookmakers enjoy a hefty 5%âââ30% margin on every bet
Bets are reversible, and winnings are uncertain
Fraud is unavoidable, and accepted for being so
Single point of failureâââwhat if the bookmaker disappears?
Betting is considered gamblingâââdisproportionately risky, largely due to the centralized partyâs lack of transparency
These problems multiply by 10 when it comes to betting offline, so it is little wonder that users are increasingly taking the lesser of two evils.

The solution: an electronic prediction system that replaces reluctant trust with cryptographic proof, allowing any two anonymous parties from anywhere in the world to bet directly against each other without the need for a trusted third party.

The Anonymous Peer-to-Peer Electronic Prediction Exchange (PEX) allows parties to directly bet against each other without going through a central authority or bookmaker. The management of bets and the settlement of winnings are carried out collectively by the blockchain network, protecting users from any single point of failure. PEX has unique properties that allow exciting use cases, previously impossible under any traditional betting mechanism.

It is our hope that PEX will change todayâs perception of bettingâââoften needlessly portrayed as a shady gambling game, due mostly to reliance on centralized parties looking for unethical, cutthroat ways of making a profit.
PEX directly challenges the shadowy gambling industry with an open, transparent prediction market exchange.

This exchange will be where people get together and predict like they have always done, on future events in sports, politics, science, markets, climate, and everything under the sunâââas individuals who are invested in the world we are building naturally do.
Running on top of the Ethereum blockchain, PEX is an anonymous peer-to-peer decentralized prediction exchange that provides a simple way for anyone to:
Place a Support Order (Ask) or an Against Order (Bid) on an outcome
Be a Market Maker (Lay the odds) or a Market Taker (Back the odds)
Be a Creator of their own Prediction Market
Collect winnings instantly (guaranteed under a Smart Contract)
Outcomes as tradable assets. Odds as prices.
In a stock exchange, the tradeable asset is share, and traders bet on share unit prices (e.g. sell 100 shares of Apple at $200 each).
In a coin exchange, the tradeable asset is coin, and traders bet on coin unit prices (e.g. buy 2 Bitcoin at $7000 each).

Similarly, in a decentralized prediction exchange like PEX, the tradeable asset is outcome of an event, and traders bet on the odds of that outcome. They can bet for the outcome (support it), or bet against it. For example: an outcome of the match Brazil vs. Spain could be that âBrazil winsâ. John can bet on that outcome with odds of 2.0. Mary can bet on that outcome with odds of 2.25. Peter can bet against that outcome (âBrazil losesâ or âBrazil drawsâ) with odds of 1.9.

Importantly, PEX does not accept bets and hold stakes, but instead matches the users who support the outcome with the users who are against the outcome. The stakes are held in an Escrow smart contract.

The Escrow smart contract is unstoppable. It runs exactly as programmedâââto forward its escrow balance to the winner at the endâââwithout any possibility of downtime, fraud or third-party interference. Once both parties commit to a bet, it is irreversible. Payment is guaranteed and instant.
The entire process happens without any party revealing their identities. Itâs 100% anonymous.
All this happens without a central authority or bookmaker. Itâs carried out collectively by all the nodes of the blockchain.
This is why you should bet on the blockchain.
PEX is different from what you know. It also provides more autonomy than what you know. Just as importantly, it is designed to be easy to create bet markets and place bet orders.
If you donât have ETH yet, you have a choice of buying ETH directly in PEX with your credit card. You can also buy ETH from popular coin exchanges like Coinbase or Binance.
PEX will support other cryptocurrencies soon.
Step 2: Top up your PEX Wallet

Transfer the ETH you just bought into the PEX Wallet, so that you can start placing bets with your ETH. The PEX Wallet is completely decentralized. The private key is held on your phone and only you can access it. Only you can transfer and receive ETH.
First, pick a prediction market that interests you (i.e. BrazilâââSpain), the outcome (i.e. âBrazil winsâ) and the side (i.e. support or bet against the outcome).

Then enter the stake you want to bet (i.e. 1 ETH) and the odds (i.e. 1/2.25). The stake will be put into an escrow smart contract. The PEX Matching Engine will then find another order that bets against the odds you set.
Our ETH is on Argentina for this one.

Once the event ends, the reporter of the market will report the result within the reporting window (set by the market creator). Generally, you should expect to have the report within minutes. If you win, your winnings will be automatically transferred from the escrow smart contract to your account.
May the odds be ever in your favour.

While most users will place orders in existing markets, PEX allows anyone to create a prediction market about any future eventâââbe it in sports, politics, science, or literally any other aspect of modern life. You, as the market creator, can set the market fee, the market closing time, the reporter of the outcome, and the reporting deadline.
The core components of the PEX architecture are:

PEX allows anyone to create a prediction market about any future event. This can be in any fieldâââsports, politics, science, lifestyle, even weather and so on. The only limit here is your creativity. Each market is part of an on-chain smart contract. It has its own order book, makers and takers.

Each Prediction Market has its own order book. PEX Order Book manages all Support Outcome Orders (ask) and all Against Outcome Order (bid). It aggregates all orders with the same price (odds) into an entry on the order book.

PEX uses a first-in, first-out (FIFO) order book. Orders are executed in price-time priority. This means that it will match by price first, and if there are two orders with the same price, then it will match by time.

In some cases, the amount placed on either side is uneven, and the order will be partially filled. The remaining order will be matched with the next best price-then-time in the order book until the order is completely filled.
A user places a Support Outcome Order into the Open Order Book
Another user place an Against Outcome Order into the Open Order Book
Matching Engine finds a match and moves both Orders from the Open Order Book to Matched Order Book
PEX REST API has endpoints for order management, account management, and public market data.
PEX Web Socket feed provides real-time market data updates for orders and trades.
The privacy afforded to the user is a deliberate design.

PEX is not a mobile app. Itâs freely accessible on the mobile web. While native mobile apps sometimes have better UI/UX, they must be hosted by centralized app stores like Android Play Store or Apple App store. In our view, a more attractive UI is not an acceptable tradeoff for compromised privacy.
The need for a password, email or phone number is obsolete.

PEX doesnât collect your personal information. You can use PEX with complete privacy. When you first open PEX, a public/private keypair will be created silently in the background and stored locally on your phone. The public key acts as your anonymous username, and the private key is your password. PEX doesnât have access to your private keyâââonly you do.

Note that in the Profile Settings, we provide an option for the user to enter their email address. The purpose is not to collect your email, but for a better experience, especially in use cases related to payments. Itâs completely optional.
Note also that there is an option to backup your private key in Settings. We highly recommend doing so.

PEX is built on top of Ethereum, which is a public blockchain, but privacy is maintained by keeping your public key anonymous. While the public can see that someone is predicting on something, itâs almost impossible to find out who that someone is.

Similar to stock and coin exchanges, the order book, sizes, odds, and time are public, but the order book doesnât disclose who the order makers and takers are. The order book records the bet anonymous parties place against each other, based on their opposing predictions of an event. Once the event concludes and the report is available, the escrowed funds are transferred automatically to the winner.
There are two main types of fees: winning fee and network fee.

The winning fee is set by the market creator, as a percentage of the total winnings of that market. Itâs entirely up to the market creator to set their own fees. Since PEX allows anyone to create a prediction market, we expect that the fees will be very competitive among markets. This is the best case scenario for users.

The network fee is 20% of the creatorâs winning fee. This pays for engineering, infrastructure, and maintenance of the network. At the beginning, this will be undertaken by the Core Ninja Team. But we expect that over time we will decentralize the team and design a mechanism that opens it up to the entire community.
Optionally, we are considering a referral fee for the market creator. The referral pool could be 10%âââ20% of the winning fee, which will help in adding a lot more users to the market.

The deeper we dive into building PEX, the more it seems that we have to initially strike a compromise between speed and decentralization, while always retaining security. In relation to settlement, which requires the report of the outcome to be available immediately after each event (i.e. a sports event), we will opt for speed, for now.

In the first release, the Core Ninja Team will assume the reporting role and report the outcome of all events. Weâre researching and designing a decentralized mechanism that will allow the community to report the outcomes.
PEX is a purely peer-to-peer version of electronic prediction that allows parties to bet directly against each other without going through a central authority or bookmaker
PEX is open-source; its design is public, nobody owns or controls PEX and everyone can take part.
